 - Open Data = More citations [(Piwowar et al. 2007)](http://journals.plos.org/plosone/article?id=10.1371/journal.pone.0000308)
 - Up-to-date statistics on readership [(e.g. PLOS ALM)](http://article-level-metrics.plos.org/)
